actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Toxic Substances Control Act to establish certain requirements regarding the disposal of polychlorinated biphenyls, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Toxic Substances Control Act to require that facilities for the treatment, storage, or disposal of polychlorinated biphenyls meet specified requirements of the Solid Waste Disposal Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Toxic Substances Control Act to establish certain requirements regarding the disposal of polychlorinated biphenyls, and for other purposes.
